content: the lovely ponytail headband crochet pattern please add this crochet pattern to your raverly favorites ***free crochet pattern link *** https //poshpoochdesignsdogclothes blogspot com/2021/02/the-lovely-ponytail-headband-crochet html **video link ** https //youtu be/xavtngssg28 skill easy materials crochet hook i/ 5 50 mm yarn- med 4 1 oz acrylic cotton blend or whatever you have on hand ponytail band standard size yarn needle tape measure stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet space space skip skip special stitch 2 double_crochet cluster stitch 2dccl yo insert hook in the next st yo pull the yarn through the st yo pull the yarn through the 2 loops on the hook repeat you will have 2 uncompleted double_crochet yo pull yarn through all 3 loops on the hook size 24 x 4 inches please do not copy or redistribute this crochet pattern
